name: Doig-test
tagline: Test sandbox for learning to use github
body:
=========

Files, handouts for Knight Science workshop

Download to desktop

  • CA earthquakes (txt)
  • Grad STEM programs (Excel)
  • Cancer incidence (Excel)
  • Prime hospitals (Excel)
  • NSF awards in MA (Excel)

    • Word docs and PowerPoint slides

  • Web 2.0 tools (PPT -- 10.7Mb)
  • Finding science data (PPT)
  • Statistics for science journalists (PPT)
  • Excel for journalists (PPT)
  • Torturing Excel to do statistics (Word)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
